scenarioBuilder.title: Simulate Facilities
scenarioBuilder.helpResetFeature: The configurations made in regards to the facility will be reseted
scenarioBuilder.warningNoData: No theme data layer has been loaded yet. Please select at least one analysis theme from the theme data layer tree.
scenarioBuilder.requiredFieldMissing: One or more required fields were not filled in.
scenarioBuilder.optionalField: This column has no influence on the display or other analysis functions
scenarioBuilder.essentialField: This field is essential for the display and search functions
scenarioBuilder.infoText: New fictitious institutions can be created for the selected theme data sets. These can be used for all CoSI analysis functions. They are not stored outside CoSI.

moveFeatures.title: Move Facilities
moveFeatures.onlySimulatedWarning: Attention: You can now also move real facilities. Your changes are only temporary and will not be saved after the session.

scenarioManager.title: Scenario manager
scenarioManager.dublicateName: Name duplicate. Please select a different name
scenarioManager.deleteScenarioWarning: Do you really want to delete the active scenario? All changes will be lost.
scenarioManager.helpPruneAllFeatures: Delete all created features in the scenario and reset manipulated data.
scenarioManager.helpPruneNeighborhoods: Delete all residential quarters of this scenario
scenarioManager.helpPruneSimulatedFeatures: All simulated facilities of this scenario will be deleted.
scenarioManager.pruneAllFeaturesWarning: Do you really want to delete all simulated facilities?
scenarioManager.noActiveScenario: Please select a scenario or create a new one.

featureEditor.noScenarioWarning: Please create a scenario first before you try to edit a facility.
